title: College Culture
description: Just a few days ago, seniors made their final college decisions. What are PAâ€™s social norms around discussing them?

questions.text: Do you believe it is socially acceptable to ask seniors where they are going to college?

options.text: Depends on how well I know them

questions.text: Have you ever looked up a PA senior on social media to see where they are going to college?
Would you announce what college you are going to on social media?

options.text: Only if I consider the college prestigious
